title: Coocaa 106 cm (42 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with HDR 10 and Dolby Audio  (42S6G)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Wall Mount, Remote, Base Stand Installation, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card, 2 Batteries, Base Stands, 4 Screws
product_specification.Picture Engine: Trochilus Extreme, Hightech AI Quad Core Processor
product_specification.Other Video Features: Vivid Color, Movies Support in USB Mode, Auto Backlight Scan, Smooth Motion Rate, Digital Noise Reduction
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Automatic Volume Level (AVL), Digital Media Player (DMP) Content: Music, Music Alone Mode, Audio Equalizer
product_specification.Other Internet Features: RJ45 Port, Dual Band WiFi, Play Store, Google Eco System, Chromecast, Voice Search
product_specification.Stand Type: Wall Mount Stand and Table Top Stand
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product by An Unauthorised Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Trocilus Extreme Picture Engine: This TV makes use of the Trocilus Extreme Picture Engine technology to ensure vibrant colour reproduction. It does so by adjusting the skin colour, true colour restoration, and the dynamic contrast.
product_description.Certified Android P (9.0): This TV features certified Android 9.0. You can access the Google Play Store to download all your favourite licensed apps. This will elevate your TV-watching experience.

review: One week after I have put this review... TV picture quality is good.. sound is not Dolby Atmos ... Only surround speakers... Best price and good quality... Except remote poor quality.. No voice assistant, no Alexa built in.. Google assistant not in remote... Except remote the product is very satisfied.. hope it will work for a longer period... Bought this for 16750.. worth a lot for other brands... Also delivery and installation is very fast.. with in a week everything done even in Corona period... May some more additional sound and picture options provided means it would be excellent... But product is worth for this price range ... Company concentrate to develop good remote ... upto now works pretty well... No issues... Full HD picture quality ..
It’s a good quality product.... picture quality is awesome.... just sound is little low .. but overall product is superb I am satisfied 👍
It's more than expected, Awesome picture quality with a great sound effect. Very satisfied and ofcourse happy. I'll suggest to go for it.Full value for money.
TV stopped working within one month. Following up past one month customer care to arrange technician, but no luck. Go for this TV only if you want to waste your time and money.

I got this in 16k on Sale.
Completely value for money.
I will say display is superb.
From nowhere u can say that this TV is anywhere inferior then any branded Smart TV.

I bought in sale at Rs 16999.
It completely justify to its price and excellent picture quality and excellent connectivity.
However Installation process was very slow and very frustrating , otherwise all good .
Go for it

Best product thanks

Mindblowing first of all I thanks COOCAA to provider best quality of lifestyle and talking care of customer awesome products given to me.

Regarding Service and Installation.

I received the product on 25 May 2021 and the last date for returning the product is on June 4th.
Until now the installation team didn't come yet and i called several time and each time they were postponing the dates.
Its really bad experience for me.

Everything is perfect except voice control remote.
There is no voice command control in the remote...
Video and audio is superb at the cost
